name: Museum of souls
description:
You're stuck in an hidden room of the Louvre where some Cursed artpieces are stored.
You have to watch out for the deadly paintings who prowls in the corridors.
If you want to survive ...

Made for the Studio M Game Jam (1st place ex-aequo)
Please leave a comment, It help us a lot !

Controls : ZQSD + Mouse

Music used :
-Incompetech - Giant Wyrm
-ThrillShowX - [Quiet] 
-The Musician - Free channel jingle

Team :
Kevin Battan : Painting design - Monster design - 3D art - Texturing
William Lambert : 3D art - Texturing
Bruno Brunet : 3D art - Texturing - Level design
Léo michel : Game design, Programmer
Robine Kosinski : Level Design, Game art,  Sound Design
